description: This file defines the interface IButler within the WPEFramework namespace, including nested structures for notifications and various methods for managing value points and interactions with modules. It mainly provides an abstract class with virtual methods for managing value points, notifications, and file operations.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: An abstract interface for a Butler component managing value points, notifications, and module interactions.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: A nested interface within IButler for handling notifications such as additions, removals, updates, and metadata changes of IValuePoint elements.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification sink to receive change events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification sink from receiving change events.

methods.name: Element (by name)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific IValuePoint identified by name.

methods.name: Element (by id)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific IValuePoint identified by ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Returns a source string for a given module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Gets the branch number for a given path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Links a path to a module ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Renames or moves a value point within the hierarchy.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a value point at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Returns an iterator over orphaned value points for a given module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
